activation.dlgActivationText: Join the Future of Imagery Today!
activation.dlgActivationCodeLabel: If you have already received a code enter it here
activation.dlgActivationTrialText: Our boosted trial period lets you see first hand the future of imagery in [$HOST_PLATFORM_NAME]!
activation.dlgTrialText: You must complete the registration to start your free trial!

activation.dlgActivationText: Join the Future of Imagery Today - For FREE!
activation.dlgActivationCodeLabel: For Enterprise-level Mass Deployments Only: Paste code below and click the 'Activate' button
activation.dlgActivationTrialText: Connect [$HOST_PLATFORM_NAME] with Google Earth, and boost your design workflow
activation.dlgActivationTrialButton: ACTIVATE FOR FREE NOW! CLICK HERE →
activation.dlgTrialText: You must complete your registration on Plex-Earth Lite!

onSubcriptionExpiredMessage.content:
<Grid VerticalAlignment='Center'> 
                        <TextBlock>
                          <Hyperlink NavigateUri='action:gotoRenew'>
                            <Image Height='640' Source='https://plugin-cdn.plexearth.com/Images/background5.jpg'/>
                          </Hyperlink>
                        </TextBlock>
                        <StackPanel Margin='24'>
                          <TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H1}' Foreground='White'>Keep up with your competitive advantage!</TextBlock>
                          <TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H3}' Foreground='White'>We are sorry but your subscription has expired.</TextBlock>
                        </StackPanel>
                      </Grid>

onTrialSuccessMessage_Classic.content: Your Plex-Earth 2025 Free Trial has just started!
onTrialSuccessMessage_Classic.title: Welcome to Plex-Earth!

onTrialExpiredMessage_Classic.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source=''/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H2}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Your Free Trial Has Ended – What’s Next?</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'><LineBreak/>You have two options:<LineBreak/>1) <Bold>Upgrade to one of our service plans</Bold><LineBreak/>   For full access to all features.<LineBreak/>2) <Bold>Continue with Plex-Earth Lite</Bold><LineBreak/>   Our free edition, to keep using basic features.<LineBreak/></TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Run>Need assistance or more information?  </Run><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='[$URL_ROOT_GOTO]/[$PROD_REF]/plugin/support'>Contact Support</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
onTrialExpiredMessage_Classic.title: Your Free Trial Has Ended – Keep Designing with Plex-Earth!

onSwitchEditionMessage_Classic.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source=''/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H2}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Switch To Plex-Earth Lite!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Our free edition, to keep using basic features.<LineBreak/></TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Run>Need assistance or more information?  </Run><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='[$URL_ROOT_GOTO]/[$PROD_REF]/plugin/support'>Contact Support</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
onSwitchEditionMessage_Classic.title: Switch To Plex-Earth Lite!

onLiteActivationSuccessMessage.content: Plex-Earth Lite has been activated successfully!
onLiteActivationSuccessMessage.title: Welcome to Plex-Earth Lite!

onSwitchEditionMessage_Lite.content: <Grid VerticalAlignment='Center' MaxWidth='900'><TextBlock><Image Width='900' Source=''/></TextBlock><StackPanel><DockPanel Margin='24'><DockPanel.Background><SolidColorBrush Color='#101010' Opacity='0.9'/></DockPanel.Background><StackPanel Margin='24'><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H2}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Upgrade To Plex-Earth Pro!</TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF' TextWrapping='Wrap'>Get everything with our full edition.<LineBreak/></TextBlock><TextBlock Style='{DynamicResource H4}' Foreground='#FFF'><Run>Need assistance or more information?  </Run><Hyperlink Foreground='#DD6B45' NavigateUri='[$URL_ROOT_GOTO]/[$PROD_REF]/plugin/support'>Contact Support</Hyperlink></TextBlock></StackPanel></DockPanel></StackPanel></Grid>
onSwitchEditionMessage_Lite.title: Upgrade To Plex-Earth Pro!
